thread.title: Harvest Minerals to reveal potash resource extraction report
thread.title_full: Harvest Minerals to reveal potash resource extraction report | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: Harvest Minerals to reveal potash resource extraction report
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors) Harvest Minerals ( ASX:HMI ) has been granted a trading halt by the ASX pending details regarding the results of a “Mineral Resource Estimate and a Reasonable Prospects for Extraction” report.

The company has Coffey preparing the report over the Sergi Potash Deposit in Brazil.

Highlighting the opportunity Brazil is the largest potash importer and the third largest potash consumer in the world.

The halt will remain in place until the opening of trade on Tuesday 21st July 2015 or earlier if an announcement is made to the market.
 
Proactive Investors Australia is the market leader in producing news articles and research reports on ASX emerging companies with distribution in Australia UK North America and Hong Kong / China.
